meanings.definition: A person who holds a job.
meanings.sent1: The jobholders at the office work hard every day.
meanings.sent2: The jobholders in the company receive a salary each month.
meanings.sent3: The jobholders decided to have a potluck lunch to celebrate their hard work.
meanings.sent4: The jobholders are the gears that keep the company running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The jobholders are like puzzle pieces that fit perfectly into the workforce.

meanings.definition: Those who are employed in a particular position or occupation.
meanings.sent1: The jobholders in the factory operate the machinery efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The jobholders in the restaurant serve delicious meals to customers.
meanings.sent3: The jobholders organized a surprise party for their boss.
meanings.sent4: The jobholders are the backbone of the organization, ensuring its success.
meanings.sent5: The jobholders shine brightly in their respective roles, contributing to the team's success.
